@NitinJP i dont think a video is not 720p just because its not  1280*720 .... When the source aspect ratio is different , if you change the aspect ratio to fit the perfect resolution too much , The video looks stretched ... Thats why its a bit short of 720 ... It is called 720p ... Anyways , Just saying ...

Thanx for the movie riddlera... good work bro

@Bkitz & nitinjp : the video in blu ray is 1280 x 720 but it has black bars ... riddlerA removes those black bars & thus the resolution is 1280 x 528.. still 720p... & it helps in reducing the size as those bars r useless anyways :)
